Have you guys heard the good news? #AgentsOfSHIELD gets full season order

ABC has picked up the back-nine episodes to round out a full traditional 22-episode season.

attachments.displayName: ‘Marvel’s Agents of SHIELD’ gets full season order | EW.com
attachments.content: Coulson lives — some more! ABC’s Tuesday night heroes are sticking around for a full season as Marvel’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. is getting a full...

items.title: Windows users, do this. Especially if you're on an SSD that's low on space.

object.content: Windows users, do this. Especially if you're on an SSD that's low on space.

attachments.displayName: Recover Tons of Wasted Disk Space with the New Windows Update Cleanup
attachments.content: Windows: Microsoft has released a Windows 7 update that adds a new option in the Disk Cleanup tool called Windows Update Cleanup. With it, you can free up several gigabytes of hard drive space from the bloated Windows Updates folder.
